name: language-flex

0.1.0.name: language-flex
0.1.0.description: A short description of your package

readme:
# language-flex package

Atom language support for [Apache Flex][apache_flex]. Originally converted from the [Flex TextMate Bundle][flex_tmbundle]

[apache_flex]: http://flex.apache.org
[flex_tmbundle]: https://github.com/simongregory/flex-tmbundle

# Maintainer

[Simon Gregory](http://blog.simonregory.com)
